New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored 128 runs, the highest score by an Indian batsman in the match
Key Match Events: Shreyas Iyer was named the Player of the Match
Post-Match Reflections: India won the match by 160 runs, securing a significant victory in the ICC Cricket World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under lights at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru
Others: The match was the 47th of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24 series
